scripts.cov: npm run test:prepare && npm run test:coverage
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:build && npm run test:prepare && npm run test:unit
scripts.test:coverage: node -r ts-node/register node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover --config=tools/istanbul.yaml node_modules/.bin/jasmine JASMINE_CONFIG_PATH=tools/jasmine.full.json || exit 0
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:ts || exit 0
